_len=arguments.length,args=new Array(_len),_key=0;_key<_len;_key++){args[_key]=arguments[_key];}clearTimeout(timer);timer=setTimeout(()=>fn(...args),ms);};}// The workhorse: update stats + highlights const doAnalysisAndHighlight=useCallback(()=>{if(!editor)return;const text=editor.getText();// If nothing changed, skip if(text===lastTextRef.current)return;lastTextRef.current=text;// 1) update stats setStats({wordCount:countWords(text),sentenceCount:countSentences(text),grade:calculateFleschKincaidGrade(text),ease:calculateFleschReadingEase(text)});// 2) clear existing highlights editor.chain().focus().unsetHighlight().run();// 3) highlight each sentence let offset=0;const sentences=text.match(/[^.!?…]+[.!?…]*/g)||[];for(let sentence of sentences){const trimmed=sentence.trim();const{grade,wordCount}=analyzeSentence(trimmed);// new thresholds let color=null;if(wordCount>=20)color="blue";else if(grade>targetGrade+1.5)color="red";else if(grade>targetGrade+0.5)color="yellow";if(color){const start=text.indexOf(trimmed,offset)+1;const end=start+trimmed.length;editor.chain().focus().setTextSelection({from:start,to:end}).toggleHighlight({color}).run();// set tooltip on the editor.chain().focus().setTextSelection({from:start,to:end}).extendMarkRange("highlight").setNodeAttribute("highlight","title",`Grade ${grade.toFixed(1)}, ${wordCount} words—try typing snappy const debouncedHighlight=useCallback(debounce(doAnalysisAndHighlight,200),[doAnalysisAndHighlight]);// Wire up onUpdate → debouncedHighlight useEffect(()=>{if(!editor)return;editor.on("update",debouncedHighlight);// initial pass
